he works on "strategic projects, in particular working on new products"( Eric Schmidt ). So what will Eric Schmidt be doing now that he is no longer CEO? He is Executive Chairman: As Executive Chairman, I will focus wherever I can add the greatest value: externally, on the deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership that are increasingly important given Google's global reach; and internally as an advisor to Larry and Sergey Brin .
